DISPLAY.description: Displays the value of expression, followed by a new line.

INPUT.description: Accepts a value from the user and returns it.

MOD.description: Evaluates to the remainder when a is divided by b

RANDOM.description: Evaluates to a random integer from a to b, including a and b. For example, RANDOM (1, 3) could evaluate to 1, 2, or 3.

NOT.description: Evaluates to true if condition is false; otherwise evaluates to false.

AND.description: Evaluates to true if both condition1 and condition2 are true; otherwise, evaluates to false.

OR.description: Evaluates to true if condition1 is true or if condition2 is true or if both condition1 and condition2 are true; otherwise, evaluates to false.
